title: Social Domain Expertise Enhancement Course Through Online Interactive Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Core digital literacy and intermediate-level expertise in social sciences
context.additional_context: Interaction-centered education conducted in smartphone-based limited technological environments. Composed of 10-minute modules for professionals to engage in short-duration learning during work.

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three social problem-solving strategies through peer interactions in online discussion forums.
Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in learning content using the mobile quiz feature.
Learners develop and submit at least one real-world applicable social sector solution through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
